name: Make 10
description:
Put your skills to the test with Make 10 - a minimalist puzzle game that will keep you wanting more!

Get points by dragging dice onto the board and getting a total of 10 in a row or column. Seems easy right? Give it a try now!

Features
• Endless levels
• Soothing sound effects
• Multiple color palettes for FREE!
• iPhone X ready
• Leaderboards
